en.html: In this lesson, we will ask you to set up and evaluate experiments.
en.text: In this lesson, we will ask you to set up and evaluate experiments.

__novar.SSML: In this lesson, we will ask you to set up and evaluate experiments.

$EFO_EG_?|track2.EGAtrack2: But first you will select a general area for the experiment.
$EFO_EG_?|track2.EGBtrack2: But first we will select a general area for the experiment.

$EFO_EG_?|track3.EGAtrack3: For example, you might select the general area of psychology.
$EFO_EG_?|track3.EGBtrack3: For example, we might select the general area of psychology.

$EFO_EG_?|track4.EGAtrack4: After you select the general area, you will then select a specific topic within that area.
$EFO_EG_?|track4.EGBtrack4: After we select the general area, we will then select a specific topic within that area.

EGAtrack4.SSML: After you select the general area, you will then select a specific topic within that area.

EGBtrack4.SSML: After we select the general area, we will then select a specific topic within that area.

$EFO_EG_?|track5.EGAtrack5: For example, within the general area of psychology, you might select the topic attention to color.
$EFO_EG_?|track5.EGBtrack5: For example, within the general area of psychology, we might select the topic attention to color.

EGAtrack5.SSML: For example, within the general area of psychology, you might select the topic attention to color.

EGBtrack5.SSML: For example, within the general area of psychology, we might select the topic attention to color.

$EFO_EG_?|track6.EGAtrack6: Within that topic, you will select a research question.
$EFO_EG_?|track6.EGBtrack6: Within that topic, we will select a research question.

EGAtrack6.SSML: Within that topic, you will select a research question.

EGBtrack6.SSML: Within that topic, we will select a research question.

$EFO_EG_?|track7.EGAtrack7: For example, within the topic of attention to color, you might select a research question such as does the color of the t-shirt a person is wearing affect attention?
$EFO_EG_?|track7.EGBtrack7: For example, within the topic of attention to color, we might select a research question such as does the color of the t-shirt a person is wearing affect attention?

en.html: You will set up (but not run) an experiment on the computer to answer the research question that you have selected.
en.text: You will set up (but not run) an experiment on the computer to answer the research question that you have selected.
